common.openLinkInBrowser: If you want to open the link in a different browser than your default one, copy and paste this link:

emailChange.body:
Hey {name},
you changed your email. Please click the link below to confirm your new email address.
emailChange.subject: Confirm your email change

forgotPassword.body:
Hey {name},
you requested a password reset.

You can either enter the one-time password below manually in the application
forgotPassword.subject: Reset your password

magicLink.body:
Hey {name},
you requested a login email from supastarter.

You can either enter the one-time password below manually in the application
magicLink.subject: Login to supastarter

newUser.body:
Hey {name},
thanks for signing up for supastarter.

To start using our app, please confirm your email address by clicking the link below.
newUser.subject: Welcome to supastarter

newsletterSignup.body: Thank you for signing up for the supastarter newsletter. We will keep you updated with the latest news and updates.
newsletterSignup.subject: Welcome to our newsletter

teamInvitation.body: You have been invited to join the team {teamName}. Click the button below or copy and paste the link into your browser of choice to accept the invitation and join the team.
teamInvitation.headline: Join the team {teamName}
teamInvitation.subject: You have been invited to join a team

success.message: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. We will keep you posted.
success.title: Subscribed

newsletter.subtitle: Be among the first to get access to supastarter.nextjs.
newsletter.title: Get early access
